Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay lets tackle this The user wants me to describe the underlying process of how a loan application approval goes through using the provided DECLARE model They provided a detailed prompt structure so I need to make sure I follow that closely

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: First I need to start by understanding the DECLARE model structure The model has constraint types like existence response succession etc each linking to activities with parameters like support confidence and sometimes targets The task is to explain this process stepbystep from application to disbursement highlighting how constraints ensure compliance logically order the steps and discuss business reasons behind them plus consequences of deviations

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The key points from the users request are explaining each step ensuring compliance via constraints preventing outoforder steps and discussing realworld motivations and consequences So the answer must walk through the process logically perhaps starting with receiving the application then verifying existence checking credit check etc enforcing dependencies where each step depends on prior ones

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I should structure the response starting with an overview then stepbystep explanation Need to mention how each constraint like existence must come first before gathering documents how quality assurance happens before final steps etc Also need to link reasons like regulatory compliance fraud prevention etc and speculate on what happens if steps are skipped

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I need to ensure that I dont miss any of the constraint names from the model like ReceiveApplication leading to GatherAdditionalDocuments etc Also since proceedwithoutcompliance is forbidden but mentioned maybe just note that its prohibited but not in the model Wait in the model theres proceedwithoutcompliance isnt listed as a constraint here but the absence section has ProceedWithoutCompliance which is disabled Since the user wants to mention that as a forbidden step in the explanation I should include a note against it even if its not in the model

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Also the user mentioned to explain the process in practical terms so examples like ensuring a credit check must happen before gathering documents since you need to verify credit before needing extra documents The expectations should emphasize that without these steps risk of bad decisions or fraud Possible consequences if funds are transferred too early like before credit check then subsequent checks might fail If documents arent gathered properly rejection is more likely

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Make sure to follow the structure start with a summary sentence then stepbystep explanation then discuss reasons and consequences Avoid technical jargon where possible but since the user provided model in Python maybe keep it clear Also check that I cover all required parts how steps look stepbystep constraints ensuring order reasons for constraints and outcomes of deviations

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Now writing the response start with an overview that the process is stepwise using the models constraints then go through each major phase like initial application existence check credit check document gathering etc connecting each step through dependencies Then explain why each step is critical how constraints prevent bad choices and possible penalties if steps are missed Finally touch on realworld implications and possible negative outcomes if not followed Keep it structured but concise detailed enough for the users request
